name: Deadly Burrito
description: Jump into the craziest and most frenetic game ever made for Oculus Rift, and kill everything already dead in this colorful mexican adventure! After suffering a sudden death while eating a very spicy burrito, you wake up in the mexican underwold.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 1050Ti DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 1070 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
